title: Tim Cook - Wikipedia
snippet: Timothy Donald Cook (born November 1, 1960) is an American business executive who is the current CEO of Apple. Cook had previously been the company's COO under its co-founder Steve Jobs. Cook joined Apple in March 1998 as a senior vice president for worldwide operations, and then as vice president ...
